snippet: The poultry producer’s step was its latest in addressing concerns from consumer and regulators over the effects of animal husbandry practices on antibiotic resistance.
abstract: Perdue says it will no longer use antibiotics in its hatcheries, latest step company has taken to address concerns about how animal husbandry practices have contributed to antibiotic resistance.
lead_paragraph: The poultry producer’s step was its latest in addressing concerns from consumer and regulators over the effects of animal husbandry practices on antibiotic resistance.

headline.main: Antibiotics Eliminated in Hatchery, Perdue Says
headline.print_headline: Antibiotics Eliminated in Hatchery, Perdue Says
